item.title: The Die Hard Water Jug Riddle (Solved)
item.description: This riddle is from famous Die Hard movie where Bruce Willis and Jackson have to diffuse a bomb by placing exactly 4 gallon water on a scale using 3 gallon and 5 gallon water jug.

item.title: The 6s Math Puzzle
item.description: This is a pure mathematical puzzle which evaluate your ability to solve maths equation. This is a great problem for building number sense.

item.title: Minimum set of weight puzzle
item.description: This puzzle is a mix of weight and math puzzle.
